Content: Former Chairman of the SLTB Shashi Welgama and another individual were further remanded today, as per the order from the Colombo Additional Magistrate Aruna Buddhadasa. Both suspects have been accused of the misuse of 125 million rupees, in the purchase of a spare parts deal for the SLTB. When the Case was taken for hearing this morning, the CID informed the Court that investigations are being carried out, to arrest the 3rd suspect in the incident. CID also told Courts that the 3rd suspect who was a former financial manager of the SLTB has already fled the country.
